ApplyCertificate.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: ssl.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ApplyCertificate
<Common request parameters>

{
    "DvAuthMethod": "DNS_AUTO",
    "DomainName": "wgc.red"
}

DescribeCertificates.document: This example shows you how to get the certificate list.

Host: ssl.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DescribeCertificates
<Common request parameters>

{
    "Limit": "1"
}

UploadCertificate.document: This example shows you how to upload a certificate.
UploadCertificate.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: ssl.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: UploadCertificate
<Common request parameters>

{
    "CertificatePublicKey": "CertificateContent"
}
